body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Benjamin Davis and the customer's name is Emily Morris.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Benjamin Davis, and I am with Phat Hogs, your go-to motorcycle dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Benjamin, I'm Emily Morris. I'm just looking for some information about your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Emily! I'd be happy to help you with that. What kind of motorcycle are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm not really sure yet. I want something that can handle long rides.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Sounds like you might be interested in our touring motorcycles. Before we dive deeper, could I have your email address to send you some information?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Emily! And for our records, could you please provide your phone number as well?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it is four zero two, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Emily. I’ll make sure to reach out to you with the details on our touring bikes.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That sounds perfect, Benjamin. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for your time, Emily. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out.
